definition: clear/obvious/unequivocal/to understand/to realize
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
surname Bai

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to figure out how to do something
to pretend not to know (idiom)
pinyin: fang4 zhe5 ming2 bai5 zhuang1 hu2 tu5

sentences.english: Melbury did not seem to be particularly enlightened by this explanation.
sentences.chinese: 麦尔布礼看来对这个解释并不很明白。

sentences.english: He could see how his suffering was all the mercy of the Lord coming in disguise.
sentences.chinese: 他能明白他的受苦如何都是伪装而来的主的仁慈。

sentences.english: It was he who first came to reason.
They bring home to me the true meaning of "Example is better than precept".
sentences.chinese: 他们使我明白身教重于言教的真义。

sentences.english: Hope scars, realized that even with life, are often trapped.
sentences.chinese: 望满身伤痕，才明白即使嬉笑一生，也常被困。

sentences.english: I kno , they Want me to study hard and not to aste time.
sentences.chinese: 我明白他们想让我努力学习，不要浪费时间。

sentences.english: Dr. Fang knows very well about this strategy.
sentences.chinese: 方博士很明白这条策略。

sentences.english: And through prayer, God helps me put into practice what I learn.
sentences.chinese: 借着祷告，上帝帮助我把所明白的东西付诸实践。

sentences.english: It took Cindy a long time to catch on to what Bill was saying.
sentences.chinese: 辛迪许久以后才突然明白比尔所说的话。

sentences.english: I held my breath, not knowing what to expect.
sentences.chinese: 我屏住呼吸，不明白接下来会发生什么。

sentences.english: Read your software contracts, and make sure you understand your licensing rights.
sentences.chinese: 仔细阅读软件合同，确保你明白了享有的许可权。

sentences.english: If you get what I mean.
These crusaders understand that the world is a dangerous place.
sentences.chinese: 这些十字军明白这个世界是个危险的地方。

sentences.english: It was my decision and I was fully aware of what was happening.
sentences.chinese: 这是我自己的决定，并且我完全明白所发生的一切。

sentences.english: At that moment I understood why Larry rushed to the recording mahcine every time he went back home.
sentences.chinese: 我这才明白为什么拉瑞每天回家直奔电话录音机。

to understand what one is reading or watching
actually/in fact/really
to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
to remember/to bear in mind/to learn by heart
to make sense of/to grasp the meaning of/to figure out
